author: Giel Blankestijn
comment: Looks good but I'd like to see some options: set ambient mode same as lit face (just without movement), multiple backgrounds (e.g. black, gray and white) and color themes.

author: Feng Kan
comment: Watch face a bit too small for lg watch. Ambient mode just plain not well designed.
title: Bad ambient mode

author: Sander db
comment: The ambient mode is what people will see most of the time when they look at their watch. If you guys can make the ambient mode the same as the face when the watch is active (without animations) I would give it 5 stars. Look at the ranger watch face for example which ambient mode is almost as good as the face when the watch is active
title: Can be improved

author: Michael Mason
comment: Doesn't look good like the photo's in play store!

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Unfortunatley smartwatches don't have high resolution screens. Less pixels per inch compared to phones, modern day laptops and monitors. All watch faces will vastly improve when the pixels are increased. The watch face is HD ready so it will look pixaleted etc until then. The LG watch has a smaller dimension compared to the 360. Hope this helps :)

title: too small! looks bad on lg g watch r

author: Richard Kumar
comment: Seems ite

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Thank you, better quality and updates coming soon.

title: Well its good

author: tom riddle
comment: but really could use a square version.

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Square version is on its way, working on releasing a similar face alongside it.

title: beautiful....

author: Collin Crowell
comment: Please make darker background!

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hey Collin, We just released an update with a darker background, hope you like it.

title: Nice but...

author: Dinico Win
comment: Just original.... AND REALLY CLEAN.

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Thanks for the great feedback, look out for our updates. We plan on an even cleaner and sharper design.

title: Great

author: Grant Sikora
comment: Looks great!

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hey Grant, we just updated with a darker background. Hope you like it.

author: adrian chen
comment: Amazing design. This is my favourite watch face so far yet. For me I want watch faces that focuses on look and feel rather than "features" for telling me about the weather, temperature or let me ruin the watch design by changing it colour. This design nails all the reason why i want a good looking stylish watch.
title: Best Design & Animation !!!

author: Dayo Oyedepo
comment: It would be 10 times better if you could make it darker. It's way too light

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hey Dayo, We just released an update with a darker background, hope you like it.

title: 5 stars if you can make it darker

author: Ryan Lestage
comment: What Dayo said. Great watch face. But it would be top if it was dark like the default Moto "Minimal" Watchface. Looking forward to that update!

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hey Ryan, We just released an update with a darker background, hope you like it.

title: Great, but darker

author: Rαj Mᴏᴅʟᴇ
comment: A classic watch face for Moto 360.
title: About Time Watch Face

author: Donhu Rickerby
comment: Eh

author: Josue Lopez
comment: When a notification card appears, you cannot see the gear or seconds. Not a big deal, but the addition of translucent cards would be great!

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: We have just updated our app with translucent cards. We are so grateful for hearing feedback from the community, and we will build on these. Please let us know if there are any other features requests.

title: Very nice, but...

author: Riley Brugess
comment: Watch face has so much potential but it is wasted when the face switches to a full screen face every 5 seconds. Please add option to choose
title: Looks so much better in pictures

author: Bill D
comment: This is a brilliant, but simplistic watch face. The gradients make the turning gears look elegant, and the overall face is very appealing. This is a watch face I can wear in a suit or shorts.
title: Elegant and Beautiful

author: Shubham Khichi
comment: The watch face is very smooth and simple and just fits for my business wear collection. I would love if in dimmed mode both hands would be a little tinner and remove the screw in center and also make the color of 12,3,6,9 hour shade gold or silver.  Apart from that it works great
title: Love the watch face but little tweek

author: Bn Kia
comment: On a moto 360, it looks a bit low resolution, with fuzzy edges to the hands. I also don't like the fact that it reverts to a large single dial each time it wakes. Is there a way of keeping it on the main 3 dial face? Also, the date is off centre.
title: Fuzzy

author: Harvey Wheaton
comment: Nice watch face but please can you add the option to control ambient brightness, this option is pretty much essential on the LG G Watch R.
title: Nice

comment: Very Nice...

author: Anto Davoli
comment: Not bad but the outside gear jitters instead of spinning smoothly on my g watch R. Please fix. Edit: okay cool. Look forward to it

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hi antonio, thanks for your feedback. We will look into adding an option for customising the type of spin for the outside gear.

title: The wheel rotates much more jittery then it does in the video

author: Vassteel
comment: The app does not install properly. It won't display on the 360 or show up in the 360 software

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hello~ have your moto360 received the Android 5.0.1 Lollipop update? You may need to wait for a few mins for the watch face to activate on android wear (not moto360 app) on the phone after installing. If your still having issues please contact us :)

title: It's broken

author: Andrew Butler
comment: Love skeleton watches, showing the insides doing work...   GREAT watch face. Love the ambient face too! That could be a watch face on its own.   Well Done!

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content:
Hey bro, Iaunched the About time watchface and seen you're review, it can take upto a few mins for it to activate. When it does please review again :) 
Anymore problems please contact us

title: LOVING this watch face

author: Jonathan Wong
comment: The watch face is beautifully designed, simple but yet elegant. This is so far my favourite watch face I have yet seen.
title: Beautiful Design

author: chris allen
comment: When I turn the screen on the Moto 360 I get the "big" face, and when the screen comes on full it switches to the complete face.
title: I like it.

author: The Rubenator
comment: Elegant with a nice of beauty, this is by far one of my top face for my Motorcycle 360.
title: Nice piece of work

author: Brian Volz
comment: Never installed despite purchase a few hours ago and waiting per developers earlier advice to another. Please issue refund.

reply.author: Chronocraft
reply.content: Hi Brian, have your watch receive the Android 5.0 Lollipop update? it can take a couple of minutes until the watch face synchronizes with your Android Wear device. Please give it a little time if you decide to give this another try. Feel free to get in touch if you still having the same issues.

title: Not installed

author: Frank Di Cosimo
comment: Well done, among the top contenders. Just pure perfection.
title: Beautiful

author: Vernon Jerkins
comment: Very nice watch face...this could be the best yet!
title: Been waiting for this!

author: Stephen Frempong
comment: Stunning Interface - not seen anything like it elsewhere!!

author: Jim L
comment: Very well done! Looks great on my Moto360! Can't wait for the gold edition!
title: Nice and clean

author: Joey Cummens
comment: Unapologetically beautiful!
title: I love this!!!!!

author: Brian An
comment: Nice looking watch face.  Takes a little time for the watch to appear.
title: Nice looking watch face

comment: I thought this looked good but in ambient mode it's just horrible.

reply.content: Unfortunatley smartwaches don't have high resolution screens. Less pixels per inch compared to phones, modern day laptops and monitors. All watch faces will vastly improve when the pixels are increased. The watch face is HD ready so it will look pixaleted etc until then. The LG watch has a smaller dimension compared to the 360.
